resources.string: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using \'Content here, content here\', making it look like readable English. Many desktop publishing packages and web page editors now use Lorem Ipsum as their default model text, and a search for \'lorem ipsum\' will uncover many web sites still in their infancy. Various versions have evolved over the years, sometimes by accident, sometimes on purpose (injected humour and the like).

Bufeo Tec es una empresa fundada en la ciudad de Iquitos, la única ciudad del Perú con una Maravilla Natural del Mundo, el Río Amazonas. Somos un grupo de jóvenes emprendedores con grandes ideas, con talento, y sobre todo con ganas de generar un cambio en la sociedad actual haciendo uso de la tecnología. La idea central es desarrollar tecnología en benefecio del pueblo y de esa manera conectarlos, disminuyendo así cada vez más la brecha entre el mundo informático y el mundo real.
Location permission is needed for core functionality
Permission was denied, but is needed for core functionality.
